title: Edinburgh Household Estimates
description: Number and percentage of total Edinburgh dwellings that are occupied, vacant, second homes, are occupied and exempt from paying Council Tax and that are receiving a Single Adult Council Tax discount. An 'occupied dwelling' is roughly equivalent to a household.

distribution.title: Edinburgh Household Estimates data
distribution.description: Household Estimates by Edinburgh Data Zones 2001 as published by National Records of Scotland. Data taken from http://statistics.gov.scot/data/household-estimates
